name: Flight Unlimited 2K18
description:
Soar across the beautiful skies of the San Francisco bay area and Switzerland in Flight Unlimited 2K18. Flight Unlimited 2K18 is a casual flight simulator that offers entertaining free flights, campaign missions, and a large variety of aircraft. Eventually Flight Unlimited will be an open world Vehicle Simulator that lets you pilot aircraft, boats, and automobiles in an open environment.

The campaign tasks with you missions such as rescuing a prisoner from Alcatraz, B2 Bomber surveillance over the Swiss Alps, landing your Cessna on the Golden Gate Bridge, and more!

Buzz the Golden Gate Bridge, take a fly-by of Alcatraz, scream past Levi Field, and even take a look at the future home of the world champion Golden State Warriors.

Features:
- Ultra HD Satellite Imagery covering over 500 SQ Miles.
- 4K HD Cockpits for each aircraft modeled from the ground up
- Campaign mode with GTA style missions
- 24 Hour Day/Night Cycle
- Weather effects
- Trigger failures such as engine trouble and detached wings
- Landmarks such as Alcatraz, the Golden Gate Bridge, AT&T Park, Oracle Arena, and more
- 14 aircraft each modeled with accurate flight physics and cockpit.
- Boeing 747
- B2 Spirit
- Ultralight
- F-22
- C130 Hercules
- E2C Hawkeye
- F/A-18 Hornet
- Cessna 172
- A10 Thunderbolt
- Pitts Special
- Challenger Learjet
- Douglas DC3
- Curtis P40E
- Robin DR400
